content: **from the description ** > a sturdy felted messenger bag is spruced up with colorful needle-felted pansies to use yarn for needle felting simply untwist it and brush it back to its original roving form then blend colors as a painter would **skill level ** intermediate **additional materials ** - 1 5 d rings 2 2 additional d rings for optional adjustable strap - yarn needle - tracing paper and pen - straight pins - size #38 felting needle - foam pad - magnetic snap - small scrap of fabric to match bag color interweave crochet link winter 2007 message in a flower bag 1 1 http //www interweavecrochet com/issue/materials_win07 asp#wright
